Assessment.QuestionText: Which of the following statements about the <font face="courier new">BindingSource</font> component are true and which statements are false?

Options.Option: The <font face="courier new">BindingSource</font> component allows adding records without first linking the component to the data source.
The <font face="courier new">Current</font> property indicates the current position of an item.
The <font face="courier new">DataMember</font> property specifies a list in the data source to which the component is bound.
The <font face="courier new">CurrentChanged</font> event invokes the <font face="courier new">BindingComplete</font> event.
The <font face="courier new">DataBindings</font> property allows binding the control to a data source.

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selections are: (A)-(True), (B)-(False), (C)-(True), (D)-(False), and (E)-(True).
